attributes.action: Allow Parkrun exemption from local council charges for use of public spaces
attributes.background: The recent vote in favour of charging Parkrun for use of the public footpath could open the door for other local councils do the same. This would destroy the free of use organisational events that Parkrun organise across the UK and world. Obesity is a UK wide crisis, protect Parkrun

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government and Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127719
